What you should do in general is to find named concepts and=

instead of

mount-from=3D79.00&amount-to=3D999.00&query=3Dsmith

do sth like this:

GET=
 /orders/pending/us/amount-range-2?query=3Dsmith

or if it makes sens from =
a business domain POV:

GET /pending-us-orders/amount-range-2?query=3Dsmith=


This improves API clarity.
